wf_workflow_version.name: RKIT SC item request
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
Pull from Stock or Order from Vendor if required. If the item has to be ordered, make sure to check the Backordered flag and specify the Estimated Delivery date.
Pull from Stock or Order from Vendor if required. If the item has to be ordered, make sure to check the Backordered flag and specify the Estimated Delivery date.
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

wf_condition.name: Backordered
wf_condition.short_description: If the backordered flag is set

sys_variable_value.value: Please deploy item to the user
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
Please deploy item to the user
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

wf_activity.name: Email procurement group of new ticket

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Please assign and resolve task assigned to your group for new order: ${number}
Please assign and resolve task assigned to your group for new order: ${number}
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Email procurement group of new ticket
